biography: Jonas, a familiar name from Vantaan Golfpuisto, has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on two occasions.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Jonas has always been admired for his dedication and sportsmanship. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have remained elusive, Jonas's presence has always been a welcome addition to the tournament.

Although Jonas is considered retired from the Hector Trophée, his contributions to the event are fondly remembered. His unique blend of precision and good humour has left a mark on both fellow competitors and spectators alike. The possibility of a future return remains a tantalizing prospect for fans.
